alert.note: Alert for Kootenai; Shoshone (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 03 at 11:39AM MDT until May 07 at 5:36PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Spokane WA has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Washington... Stehekin River at Stehekin affecting Chelan County. ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Idaho... Washington... Coeur d Alene River at Cataldo affecting Shoshone and Kootenai Counties. Kettle River near Ferry above Curlew affecting Ferry County. St Joe River at St Maries affecting Benewah County. St Joe River at Calder affecting Shoshone County. For the Kettle River...including Ferry above Curlew...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Coeur d Alene River at Cataldo. * WHEN...Until Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 44.0 feet, Homes near the river may experience some flooding of basements. Water will begin to cover CCC Road near the Mennonite Church. Some water will be over the section of Latour Creek Road immediately south of Interstate 90, near the campground. Due to the high water table some homes behind the Cataldo levee will be surrounded by water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM PDT Wednesday the stage was 42.5 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Friday afternoon and remain above flood stage through Saturday before receding Sunday. - Flood stage is 43.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (11 am PDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Coeur d Alene River Cataldo 43.0 42.5 Wed 9 am PDT 42.0 42.6 43.9 &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 1100 AM PDT.
